news.title: Alex G Adds Tour Dates, Shares Video for New Song “June Guitar”: Watch
news.summary: The Philadelphia musician will support new album Headlights with newly announced shows in Europe and the United Kingdom

news.title: Lorde Releases New Album Virgin: Listen and Read the Full Credits
news.summary: Lorde worked on her fourth studio album with Jim-E Stack, Fabiana Palladino, Daniel Nigro, Rob Moose, Blood Orange’s Devonté Hyves, Bon Iver’s Justin Vernon, and others
